attributes.action: Increase the police fixed penalty notices for Public Order Offences
attributes.additional_details: Currently fixed penalty notices for public order offences are £80 which is often far less than the persons receiving them spend on a night out. I am suggesting that it is increased to £200 to make it more realistic and a deterrent. Also it would help to cover the costs of detaining offenders in cells over night because they are too drunk to receive the notice on the street.
